name: Midnight Rush
description:
I'm deadly thirsty! In Midnight Rush you control a hungry vampire in a city of vampires.

His overwhelming hunger makes him leave the house in the middle of the night to get a snack. Game for Game Jam Plus #PlusSUL

THEME: Short and Addictive

WASD - Move
SPACE - Interaction 

Game artist: Francisco Lucas @ciscookiess Francisco_ Unreal Engine Programmer:  Nathan Gabriel NeitherNathan @NeitherNathan

#PlusSUL
